summary: WHILE DRIVING ON A HIGHWAY IN WYOMING, THE BRACKETS HOLDING THE SPARE TIRE, AND THE SPARE TIRE FELL OFF THE CAMPER.  WE HAD JUST PURCHASED THE CAMPER FROM THE ORIGINAL OWNER,( WHO ONLY USED THE CAMPER FIVE TIMES,) AND WE WERE RETURNING HOME.    THE  MANUFACTURER TOLD US BECAUSE WE ARE NOT THE ORIGINAL OWNER, THE WARRANTY WOULD NOT BE HONORED.     THIS CAMPER WAS MANUFACTURED IN CANADA BY FOREST RIVER, INC.    IS THERE ANY WAY WE CAN GET THE TIRE AND BRACKETS REPLACED WITHOUT COST TO US?    BRACKETS HOLDING THE SPARE TIRE ONTO THE CAMPER WERE SHODDY AT BEST.  ## VIN PASSED ## 2011 ALINER  POP UP CAMPER,FLAGSTAFF MODEL ##.  *TR
